choices.C: Time zones are automatically updated based on the setting of the computer accessing Splunk.
choices.B: Full names can only be changed by accounts with a Power User or Admin role.
choices.D: Full name, time zone, and default app can be defined by clicking the login name in the Splunk bar.
choices.A: Search & Reporting is the only app that can be set as the default application.

comments.content: The comments from your link clarify that D is the correct answer.

discussion.content:
Option B: 

D is incorrect, as we cannot edit NAme

questions.question_text: Which of the following is true about user account settings and preferences?

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the best way to create a report that shows the last 24 hours of events?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Before commands. For example: | stats sum(bytes) by host

Selected Answer: B
Pg 132 of pdf

questions.question_text: When is the pipe character, |, used in search strings?

choices.D: Before functions. For example: stats |sum(bytes) by host
choices.B: Before commands. For example: | stats sum(bytes) by host
choices.A: Before clauses. For example: stats sum(bytes) | by host
choices.C: Before arguments. For example: stats sum| (bytes) by host

questions.question_text: How can results from a specified static lookup file be displayed?
In the Fields sidebar, what does the number directly to the right of the field name indicate?

discussion.content: answer C. "The Fields sidebar displays the number of unique values for each field in the events."

choices.C: The number of unique values for the field
choices.D: The numeric non-unique values of the field
choices.B: The number of values for the field
